quest.name: Three Beaks to the Wind
journal:
Sonu Vanu is troubled by a storm gathering in the distance.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Sonu Vanu is grateful for your return to Ok' Zundu, for as if by heavenly coincidence, something is troubling him that only a courageous adventurer can help with. Zundu spies have reported unusual amounts of activity from Ok' Vundu Mok, in the heart of Vundu territory. The Zundu chief is anxious as to what this might mean for his tribe, but cannot risk the uneasy truce with the Vundu by sending his own spies. He asks that you make your way to Ok' Vundu Mok to ascertain what is causing the furor.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

You gaze over Ok' Vundu Mok and are met with the sight of three Vanu─one wearing a crown of flowers─being chased by a group of Vundu. The three Vanu are cornered, and although they attempt to stand their ground, the Vundu war dance causes them to cower in fear. You stand fearless before the dance, however, and leap to the defense of the shivering Vanu.
You slay the Vundu warriors, and the three beleaguered Vanu are safe from harm. Speak with Linu Vali to hear their tale.

Linu Vali tells you of her troubled tribe, the Gundu, who were subjugated by the Vundu and now live in fear under their rule. Her tribe seeks freedom from the Vundu, but they will not allow it, threatening any opposition with violence and imprisonment. Linu Vali is surprised when you tell her of Sonu Vanu's request, and asks that you act as a mediator in helping the Gundu tell of their plight. Return to Ok' Zundu and inform Sonu Vanu of the occurrences at Ok' Vundu Mok.

You relate the story of your journey into Ok' Vundu to Sonu Vanu, and Linu Vali offers her greetings and gratitude to the chieftain. Taking the story of the Gundu's plight to heart, Sonu Vanu grants the refugees an island to use as a safe haven, despite his attendant's protestations. Linu Vali is ecstatic at this present, promising that the Gundu will be self-sufficient, and work to make a new settlement free from Vundu influence. Go to Nakki Island, to the west of Ok' Zundu, and speak with Linu Vali to listen to her plan for building her tribe's home.

Linu Vali seems eager to begin developing the island, but needs your help dealing with some airborne pests. She asks that you rid the surrounding trees of the midge clouds, which conveniently lack the taste for netherling blood. Speak with Luna Vanu to mount a sanuwa and use its powerful buffet to drive the midges from the trees.
The midges will no longer trouble the poor Vanu, and the island has become noticeably quieter. Report your success to Linu Vali and see if there is aught more that she requires.

Linu Vali appreciates your efforts to rid Nakki Island of its pests, although it seems she may require your aid in the future. She admits to you that she lacks the courage to continue on leading the Gundu towards a new life, expressing doubt in her ability to carry on without her brother and the others that were captured by the Vundu. She asks for your help in building up the Gundu's new home. Your agreement encourages her, and she dubs the new village “Ok' Gundu Nakki.” Eager to get started on construction, she asks you to speak with Muna Vanu to learn what tasks are required of you. Lend your aid to the refugee Vanu Vanu and help them build a new home.
objectives: Report to Sonu Vanu at Ok' Zundu.
Ride the sanuwa and Buffet the midge clouds from the trees.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Like nourishing rains after long summer drought, netherling's return may bring succor in our time of need.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Zundu spies send word of activity in Ok' Vundu Mok, deep within Vundu territory. Such news bodes ill for Ok' Zundu.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: We would know more of this coming storm, but spies struggle to slip past watchful gazes of Vundu guards.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Netherling's strength and courage is always reliable, and Sonu asks herhim to brave enemy territory and bring news of what stirs in Ok' Vundu Mok.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Once again netherling proves shehe is stout ally of the Zundu. Zephyr winds at your back speed your way!

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Ok' Vundu Mok floats far above Ok' Zundu. Without wings like sanuwa to soar through skies, netherling cannot even reach their gates.

dialogue.name: ZOUHYOUBANU02164
dialogue.text: There is nowhere to run! Traitorous Gundu, punishment is nigh!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: (-Petal-crowned Vanu-)Traitorous!? We but seek freedom from cruelty of Vundu!

dialogue.name: ZOUHYOUBANU02164
dialogue.text: Nonsense! Like sanuwa, Gundu live only to serve almighty Vundu!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: (-Petal-crowned Vanu-)No more! Gundu cast off Vundu reins! Gundu are free! Gundu are free!

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: (-Elderly Vanu-)Stand back, Linu Vali! Muna Vanu teaches Vundu difference between Gundu and sanuwa!

dialogue.name: ZOUHYOUBANU02164
dialogue.text: Foolish greybeak! Even clumsy paissa laughs at your challenge as he tumbles into cloud sea! Such weaklings are not worthy foes. Cower before us!

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Such...such power! Fear cuts deeper than boreal winds!

dialogue.name: ZOUHYOUBANU02164
dialogue.text: A netherling─and one unmoved by our sundrop dance!?

dialogue.name: ZOUHYOUBANU02164
dialogue.text: What insolence! Cast netherling into cloud sea!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Die, netherling!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu cannot move...

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Netherling protect us!

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Muna Vanu's gratitude is boundless as cloud sea. Thank you, netherling.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Even most violent gale could not topple you. To stand as totem against Vundu sundrop dance...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Sundrop dance is ancient tradition of Vanu Vanu. It is display of strength and vigor, both individual and tribe. Vanu custom is to dance before battle, that enemies weak of will may yield, preventing needless bloodshed.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: ...Forgive my rudeness. I, Linu Vali of the Gundu tribe, am grateful for zephyr winds that bring netherling to our side to stand against the Vundu.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Vundu invade Gundu lands and curse our totems, but Gundu spirit will not break! All still oppose the Vundu's many misdeeds!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Summoning the White, conquering other tribes, attacking netherlings─all are affronts!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: We seek freedom from Vundu rule. But Vundu are greedy as they are cruel, and answer our pleas with violence.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Vundu talons reach far and cut deep. Many flee to distant isles to escape their wrath...yet netherling ventures deep into the Vundu homeland. Why?

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Netherling is come from Ok' Zundu? Sonu Vanu himself asks netherling to investigate?

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text:
We hear naught of Zundu after Vundu invade our lands. That they are yet free...
Netherling, Linu Vali humbly requests that you escort us to Sonu Vanu, that we might beseech the Zundu for aid.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Tribe will remember netherling's kindness for many moons to come! Now, let us depart to Ok' Zundu before the Vundu return.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: So rumblings in Ok' Vundu not sign of impending storm, but Gundu uprising.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: And now the Gundu seek protection from their pursuers...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: May zephyr winds forever guide you, Chief Sonu. I, Linu Vali, daughter of Uunu Vanu, do greet you warmly.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: My companions are Muna Vanu, former attendant to my father, and Luna Vanu, merchant of our village.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Your father and I spend many hours cloudfishing. When news of his death at Vundu claws reaches Ok' Zundu...the fiercest monsoon cannot wash away my sorrow.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Forgive us our imposition, Chief Sonu, but the Gundu suffer too long under the Vundu─better to run than to remain slaves. But Vundu are relentless, and we face terrible reprisals, if not for this netherling.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: There is no need to apologize. Zundu welcome you with open arms. Tell me, how fares your brother?

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Alas, when Linu Vanu calls for Gundu independence, Vundu imprison him in skycage and hang from island, as example to others. We attempt to free him but fail, and Vundu pursue us until we meet netherling.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: It saddens Sonu to learn this. But we are nevertheless grateful that you arrive safely to Ok' Zundu. You and yours are welcome to rest at Nakki Island for as long as you like.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Sonu Vanu, your kindness is boundless as cloud sea!

dialogue.name: SANUVANU
dialogue.text: Chief Sonu, pray do not act in haste! What will others say when they learn of this arrangement?

dialogue.name: SANUVANU
dialogue.text: Islands more precious than rain during summer drought. Some still resent netherlings for risking island to hunt the White.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Now is not the time to turn our backs on another tribe. We must do all in our power to help─for the sake of Chief Uunu and his people.

dialogue.name: SANUVANU
dialogue.text: Have we food to feed them? Wood to build them homes? How much must the Zundu sacrifice for these refugees?

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: The island is more than enough. Like seedling which takes root in rich soil and grows strong, so too will new Gundu settlement flourish on this great gift from the Zundu.

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: Such a sight would surely fill Chief Uunu with pride. Nakki Island lies to the west of Ok' Zundu. Go forth and build a new home for your people!

dialogue.name: SONUVANU
dialogue.text: The Gundu will need much assistance in the days ahead. Sonu prays you lend them a helping hand.

dialogue.name: SANUVANU
dialogue.text: Chief Sonu is too generous by half. It will fall to Sanu to quell the anger of our fellow tribesmen.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu Vali's fortune is great indeed, to meet netherling who defeats the White.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: And an island for the Gundu to start anew... The skies themselves could not grant such gifts!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: However, it seems no Vanu inhabit this island since before Linu Vali's hatchling days. Listen─sound you hear not rolling thunder, but incessant buzzing of midge swarms.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Thunderstorm might even be more welcome than midges. One bite from midge and Vanu itch until feathers fall off. But midges have no taste for netherling blood.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Netherling must help before midges cause sleepless nights for tribe! There, ride on the wings of sanuwa, and with its forceful breath drive the midge clouds from the trees.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ride the sanuwa and use its Buffet ability to drive the midge clouds from the trees.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: If sanuwa proves too much for netherling, speak with Luna Vanu to mount it once again. Worry not, even Vanu fall from sanuwa when first learning how to fly.

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Sanuwa may seem wild at first, but Luna spends many moons training this one. Treat her gently, and the skies are yours to explore!

dialogue.name: SYSYTEM
dialogue.text: The midge cloud is blown away!

dialogue.name: SYSYTEM
dialogue.text: DELETE

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Ah, the midges hum no longer. But even so, doubt still remains...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Although Linu makes promises of building new home for tribe, the uncertainty of the road ahead fills her with doubt. Linu Vali is nothing but delicate hen, with arms thin as branches and legs dainty as a gaelicat's...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: It is true, netherling─just look! One day, Linu hopes to become strong enough to send the mightiest Vanu running in fear. But like rain in monsoon season, change comes fast and without warning. Linu possesses not the courage to lead...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Make no mistake, none are more loyal than Muna Vanu and Luna Vanu, but their feathers are old and grey. Linu cannot ask them to shoulder so heavy a burden. Without Brother, and the many still under Vundu rule, Linu knows not which path to take...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: But in the black of night a beacon of light guides us. Linu speaks of you, netherling!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Please, work with us to help build a new home for Gundu! Do so, and netherling lives on through generations of Gundu storytellers!

dialogue.name: SYSYTEM
dialogue.text: Help develop Ok' Gundu Nakki?

dialogue.name: SYSYTEM
dialogue.text: Like towering totem pole, netherling supports Gundu.

dialogue.name: SYSYTEM
dialogue.text: Alas, netherling must return to herhis tribe.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: A thousand thanks, netherling! Your words clear the fog of doubt from Linu's heart.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: This is worthy of celebration! Celebration of the mighty netherling...? Linu Vali is embarrassed to ask, but...what is netherling's name?

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Forename Surname? Such an odd-sounding name... Do all members of the netherling's tribe call themselves Surname? Ah, speaking of names, new Gundu village must have one worthy of grand Vanu settlement!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: “Nakki” is ancient Vanu word for winds blowing from west, and also name of this island. Hmmm... To honor tribe of Gundu, village's name is “Ok' Gundu Nakki”!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: The village has a name, and there is nothing left now but to begin building it! Forename, speak to Muna Vanu to learn what we need.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: My heart fills with disappointment, but Linu understands. Although our time together ends here, Linu wishes netherling the best of luck.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Linu Vali and the other Gundu have begun developing Ok' Gundu Nakki!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Neutral reputation with the Gundu.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Vanu Vanu tribal quests are now available from Muna Vanu at Ok' Gundu Nakki.
